column3: SGTM.\nWill check the GUI and the consistency with other screens.\n
This was already discussed somewhat in #5801, and resulted in moving the button away from Transaction Fee.\n
Agree on concept. I'd suggest just making it 'Hide'. This saves translators some work, what it hides should be clear from the context.\n
Now, it is "Hide" instead of "Hide options". (Squashed the commit)\n
